description: painting of four square gallery exhibition posters, with various sizes of text only--no images; ULQ:  green ground, Donald Sultan Small Paintings at Blum Helman; URQ:  P.S.1 and The Clocktower's National and International Studio Artists Exhibition; LLQ:  Santino at Vox Populi; LRQ:  December:  Richard Prince, David Robbins at 303 Gallery
signed: on back along top edge, in black; Simon Linke, 1986, 60\" x 60\", oil on canvas.  Donald Sltan, Annette Adler etc., Santino, Richard Price, David Robbins, December \'85.\' - from series Artforum December, 1985
title: Donald Sultan
